jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I delete my account on Roomi?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: You can delete your Roomi account at any time. If you change your mind, we will not be able to recover it. Please contact hello@roomiapp.com and our team will remove your information from our servers.
